com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.geometry

Class WOWZSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.geometry.WOWZSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WOWZSize>

    public class WOWZSize
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<WOWZSize>, java.io.Serializable
    The WOWZSize class represents a dimension with integer-based width and height values. For example: 
             WOWZSize frameSize = WOWZSize(1280, 720);
         float aspectRatio = frameSize.aspectRatio();
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WOWZSize.ScaledDimensions
      ScaledDimensions is a utility class representing common scaling operations when placing one rectangular area (the source) in another (the destination).

      • offset

        public static WOWZSize offset(int w1,
                              int h1,
                              int w2,
                              int h2)
        Calculates the offset between two dimensions.
        Parameters:
        w1 - The width of the first dimension.
        h1 - The height of the first dimension.
        w2 - The width of the second dimension.
        h2 - The height of the second dimension.
        Returns:
        The offset between the two dimensions. Negative if the width and/or height values of the first dimension are greater than the corresponding values in the second dimension.
